details:
Diego Angulo from ImExHS discovered an issue in the webserver apache2.
The module mod\_session ignored the expiry time of sessions handled by
mod\_session\_cookie, because the expiry time is available only after
decoding the session and the check was already done before.


For Debian 8 Jessie, this problem has been fixed in version
2.4.10-10+deb8u13.


We recommend that you upgrade your apache2 packages.


Further information about Debian LTS security advisories, how to apply
these updates to your system and frequently asked questions can be
found at: <https://wiki.debian.org/LTS>
